about_the_game:
"Shoot to Shoot" is an anti-gun violence shooting game.
In this game, you cannot harm anyone with a gun. Nor do you need to.
The balls are trapped in glass cages, and you need to use bullets to give them kinetic energy and set them free.
The basket is a path to freedom, and in each level, you need to set 8 balls free.

Level Difficulty: Each level varies in difficulty. You may encounter very challenging levels, but these challenges can be overcome.
Patience Required: This game requires patience and perseverance to pass each level. You need to try repeatedly to get the balls into the basket.
Physics Engine: Experience the realistic physical collision effects of Unreal Engine 5.
Visual Effects: Minimalist visual design keeps you focused on overcoming challenges.
Replayability: Improve your skills and try to pass the levels in less time.
Variety: The game currently has 72 levels and 8 types of guns.
Easy to Understand: The game has no text, and you can interpret the game in your own way.

This is a game that requires patience to play.
Pouring anger at the balls will only waste your time and will not help you achieve your goal.
Balls destroyed by violence will be reborn through it.

name: Shoot to Shoot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not required
  • Additional Notes: Integrated graphics may perform poorly.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 13600k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 4060Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not required
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended for faster loading times.

short_description: Use the gun to shoot the balls, push the balls into the basket through physical collisions, testing your accuracy and patience.
